
## Time Series with dygraphs

Modify the dyOptions to customize the graph's appearance:

```{r, exercise=TRUE, exercise.eval=TRUE, fig.height=4}
dygraph(ldeaths) %>% 
  dyOptions(fillGraph = TRUE, drawGrid = TRUE)
```
